meanings.definition: A small bag used to carry money and personal items.
meanings.sent1: She always keeps her coins in her purses.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new purses to match my outfit.
meanings.sent3: The purses jingled with every step she took.
meanings.sent4: Her purses held secrets as well as money.
meanings.sent5: The purses were filled with memories and trinkets.

meanings.definition: To contract into wrinkles or folds.
meanings.sent1: He purses his lips when he is thinking.
meanings.sent2: The fabric purses easily when washed.
meanings.sent3: The paper purses up when wet.
meanings.sent4: The old book pages purses from age.
meanings.sent5: The flower petals purses as they dry.

meanings.sent1: She purses her eyebrows in confusion.
meanings.sent2: The dog's skin purses when it barks.
meanings.sent3: The curtain fabric purses when pulled too tight.
meanings.sent4: The balloon purses as it deflates.
